input.sentences: i wanted to go to a club . i chose this one . seems pretty good .
dark in this room but lots of people dancing and having a good time .
i had to come outside and get some air | this is a fuzzy picture . someone turn off those lights .
ah | good friends . we had a great time .
output.sentences: The guy chose a pretty pink flower for his girl while at the club.
There are lots of people here all the time.
The lights in the club make pictures look fuzzy.
Sometimes the lights are too dark.
Ah, cheers to a good time with good friends.
